pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Power Analysis Toolbox to Find Cost-Efficient Study Designs // We implement a surrogate modeling algorithm to guide simulation-based sample size planning. The method is described in detail in our paper (Zimmer Debelak (2023) doi:10.1037/met0000611). It supports multiple study design parameters and optimization with respect to a cost function. It can find optimal designs that correspond to a desired statistical power or that fulfill a cost constraint. We also provide a tutorial paper (Zimmer et al. (2023) doi:10.3758/s13428-023-02269-0).
